precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and in category view.
action: Click on the "Switch to Classic View" option located in the left navigation pane.
expected_results: The Control Panel will switch to the classic view, displaying all icons individually.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is open.
action: Locate the "Turn off hard disks:" setting and use the associated dropdown menu to select "Never".
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks:" setting will be changed to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected.
action: Locate the "System hibernates:" setting. Click on the dropdown menu next to it and select "Never".
expected_results: The "System hibernates:" setting will be changed to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected. All power-saving features are set to "Never". The "OK" button is visible.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window closes. The "Power Options" icon is visible in the Windows XP Control Panel.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open in classic icon view.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog window opens.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog is open.
action: Close the 'Power Options Properties' dialog. Double-click the 'Display' icon in the Windows XP Control Panel.

expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab opens, displaying options for screen savers, including a dropdown menu to select the active screensaver, a preview window, and settings for inactivity timeout and password protection.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click on the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of available screensavers will appear, with "Windows XP" currently selected.

precondition: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu in the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click on the "None" option in the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu will show "None" as the selected option.
The "Display Properties" window closes. The Control Panel window is visible.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel (Classic View) is open.
